blog.name: bnhaworld
blog.title: My Hero For You!
blog.description: We have imagines, head-canons, reader inserts, and more! Requests: OPEN!!! Call me CALAMARI~!

question: 13!!! with my baby todoroki pls <3333
answer:
THIS ONE IS SO CUTE OMG HERE -Calamari

“You’re lying, you’re blushing.” - “Shut up, no I’m not!”

You stared at Shoto as he sipped his tea. He had finally agreed to go on a date with you, and you were absolutely stunned by the serenity that emanated off of him when he was away from the school environment. You were taking in everything about him, your eyes flicking around his face as you were sure to take note of every detail.

Almost instantly, his dual colored orbs locked onto yours, a slight smirk forming on his lips. You quickly looked down at your down drink, fiddling with the handle of the mug.

“Why were you staring at me?” Shoto mused, placing his elbow on the table and leaning on his hand.

“I was not!” You responded a little too quickly, slowly lifting your eyes to look at him. Your cheeks burned, but you held your semi-confident facade.

“You’re lying, you’re blushing.” He chuckled softly, reaching over for your hand. 

 “Shut up, no I’m not..” You murmured, shyly letting him take your hand in his.

title: Good Enough
description:
by lovecook

Kirishima finds himself entranced by a special deal on engagement rings while out shopping. He’s been dating Bakugou for a long time, so of course he’s thought about marriage before, but does he have the guts to officially make it official, and declare to the world that Bakugou is his? Or will his insecurities once again get in the way?

Adult Kirishima Eijirou and Bakugou Katsuki!! No spoilers ahead, from the manga or the anime!

Words: 4030, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

blog.description:

☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Living Nightmares
description:
by Ellipsia

At the age of five, Maren’s life was already shit. The product of a quirk marriage, she was abandoned by her parent who didn’t love each other. Left alone, she was forced to defend herself, something that wasn’t easy and that often ended in less than ideal situations.

But all that changed after a villain attack. After she was saved by a hero, she followed him home, and soon some sort of family agreement was made. Thus Maren’s life changed.

Now in the life of heroes, what will happen when nightmares of her past come back to haunt her?

Words: 801, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Original Characters, Todoroki Shouto, Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Kirishima Eijirou, Uraraka Ochako, Iida Tenya, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic, Asui Tsuyu, Yaoyorozu Momo, Mineta Minoru, League of Villains (My Hero Academia)
  • Relationships: Todoroki Shouto/Original Character(s), Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou

☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: The Lost Hero
description:
by distendedmarimo

16 years have passed since the avatar All Might sacrificed himself to save the human and spirit world. But the war, once dormant, rages once again in his absence. On her quest to find the lost avatar, Ochako meets Izuku. He’s a non-bender with dreams of ending the war and he’s got a lot to learn before he’s ready to save anyone. Together they must assemble a team and maybe, they can save the world.
Meanwhile, two rogues meet. Eijirou, of The Red Mountain Isles, has lived in relative peace on his own until a certain outlaw, cast out by the fire nation, washes ashore. Brash, powerful, and fit to explode, Bakugo is a shunned noble. Eijirou struggles to protect the villagers from the growing threat of the fire nation only to find a soft spot for the jagged edged Katsuki.

An avatar AU with the characters of My Hero Academia, the best of both with plenty of twists.

Words: 1135, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

trail.content:
AHHH! I can’t believe I got this done so fast!! 😅

Some art of that heart-tugging scene with All Might in Chapter 93 of “A Dangerous Game” by the fabulous @tsukithewolf!

I comment so much on it but I’ve been wanting to draw something for this story for MONTHS and I FINALLY got some insperation for it!

Less dark version:
